text: Tumi suryake dekhabe, yakhana udita haya, tadera guha theke pasa kete dana dike cale yaya ebam yakhana asta yaya, tadera theke pasa kete bamadike cale yaya, athaca tara guhara prasasta catbare abasthita. Eta allahara nidarsanabalira an'yatama. Allaha yake satpathe calana, se'i satpatha prapta ebam tini yake pathabhrasta karena, apani kakhana'o tara jan'ye pathapradarsanakari o sahayyakari pabena na.
